servinfo.title: Idle Speed and IAC Throttle Valve Opening Inspection
servinfo.ptxt: Before idle speed check, make sure of the following.

item.ptxt: Lead wires and hoses of electronic fuel injection and engine and emission control systems are connected securely.
Valve clearance has been is checked according to maintenance schedule.
All electrical systems (wipers, heater, lights, A/C, etc.) are out of service.
Air cleaner has been properly installed and is in good condition.
There are no abnormal air drawn in from air intake system.
There are no obstruction in PCV valve or its hoses.
There are no DTC in ECM.
Check following item turn OFF by using “Data List” mode on scan tool.

servinfo.ptxt: After confirming all items, check idle speed and IAC throttle opening as follows.

attention3.ptxt: Before starting engine, place gear shift lever in “Neutral” (M/T model) or selector lever in “P” range (A/T model), and set parking brake and block drive wheels.

s1.ptxt: Turn OFF ignition switch and connect SUZUKI scan tool to DLC (1).
Warm up engine to normal operating temperature.
Check engine idle speed and “IAC throttle opening” using “Data List” mode on scan tool.
If check result is out of specification, inspect the following.

item.ptxt: Improper engine idle speed referring to “Improper engine idling or engine fails to idle” in

s1.ptxt: Check that specified engine idle speed is obtained with A/C turned ON if vehicle is equipped with A/C.
